languages.text: "Предубеждения? Эдак ты ловко окрестил веру во Всеотца. Я предупреждал тебя, {name}. Ты сделал{mf||а} свой выбор".
"Prejudice? A fine thing to call my faith in the Allfather. I warned you, {name}. You have made your choice."
languages.original_text: "Предубеждения? Эдак ты ловко окрестил веру во Всеотца. Я предупреждал тебя, {name}. Ты сделал{mf||а} свой выбор".

traits.locale_text: "Prejudice? Fine thing to call my faith in the Allfather. I warned you, {name}. You've made your choice."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Prejudice? Fine thing to call my faith in the Allfather. I warned you, {name}. You've made your choice."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Prejudice? A fine thing to call my faith in the Allfather. I warned you, {name}. You have made your choice."

traits.locale_text: "Prejudice? A fine thing to call my faith in the Allfather. I warned you, {name}. You have made your choice."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “偏见？这是我对全父的信仰，信仰。我早就警告过你，{name}，而你已经做出了选择。”
languages.original_text: "Prejudice? A fine thing to call my faith in the Allfather. I warned you, {name}. You have made your choice."

traits.locale_text: “偏见？这是我对全父的信仰，信仰。我早就警告过你，{name}，而你已经做出了选择。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「偏見だと？私の全知の父への信仰を、そう呼ぶのか？警告はしたぞ、{name}。お前が自分で選択したんだ」
languages.original_text: "Prejudice? A fine thing to call my faith in the Allfather. I warned you, {name}. You have made your choice."

traits.locale_text: 「偏見だと？私の全知の父への信仰を、そう呼ぶのか？警告はしたぞ、{name}。お前が自分で選択したんだ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «¿Prejuicios? Buena manera de llamar a mi fe en el Padre de todas las cosas. Se lo advertí, {name}. Ha elegido».
languages.original_text: "Prejudice? A fine thing to call my faith in the Allfather. I warned you, {name}. You have made your choice."

traits.locale_text: «¿Prejuicios? Buena manera de llamar a mi fe en el Padre de todas las cosas. Se lo advertí, {name}. Ha elegido».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Vorurteile? Ein hübsches Wort für meinen Glauben an den Allvater. Ich habe Euch gewarnt, {name}. Ihr habt Eure Wahl getroffen."
languages.original_text: "Prejudice? A fine thing to call my faith in the Allfather. I warned you, {name}. You have made your choice."

traits.locale_text: "Vorurteile? Ein hübsches Wort für meinen Glauben an den Allvater. Ich habe Euch gewarnt, {name}. Ihr habt Eure Wahl getroffen."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Mes préjugés ? Voilà une drôle de façon de qualifier ma foi envers le Père de Tous. Je vous avais {mf|prévenu|prévenue}, {name}. Vous avez fait votre choix. »
languages.original_text: "Prejudice? A fine thing to call my faith in the Allfather. I warned you, {name}. You have made your choice."

traits.locale_text: « Mes préjugés ? Voilà une drôle de façon de qualifier ma foi envers le Père de Tous. Je vous avais {mf|prévenu|prévenue}, {name}. Vous avez fait votre choix. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Ön yargı mı? Yücebaba'ya olan inancıma bu adı layık gördün demek. Seni uyarmıştım {name}. Seçimini yaptın."
languages.original_text: "Prejudice? A fine thing to call my faith in the Allfather. I warned you, {name}. You have made your choice."
